text: "Dreaming My Dreams with You" is a 1975 song by Waylon Jennings and is the title track to his 22nd studio album Dreaming My Dreams with You. It went to number 10 on the Billboard Hot Country Single charts and was covered by Colleen Hewett in 1979 and went to number 2 in Australia. ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:Country songs Category:Waylon Jennings songs Category:Colleen Hewett songs Category:Emmylou Harris songs Category:Rodney Crowell songs Category:Martina McBride songs Category:Marianne Faithfull songs Category:Crystal Gayle songs Category:Jewel (singer) songs
title: Dreaming My Dreams with You
